content.rendered:
2 Year Classroom Program

Synchronized Study of XI-XII Board and a National Level Entrance Examination

ENROLL NOW

CAPSTONE PROGRAM
XI + XII+ JEE
MAINS + ADVANCED

Duration
2 Year Regular Classroom Course

Board + Entrance
Simultaneous preparation for both boards and entrance exams

Course Commencement
April | May | June

LEADER Course

CRASH COURSE: MHT-CET & NEET

BECOME A LEADER

Specially designed course for Class XII students which will improve chances of admission in top engineering/medical colleges in short duration.

  • Extensive (45) Days Program
  • Doubt Clearing Sessions Immediate after
    regular tests
  • Conduction of (30) Minor tests and (15)
    Major tests

PYRAMID Online Test Series

JEE (Main + Advanced) | NEET (UG) | MHT-CET

ENROLL NOW
Pyramid conducts online test series program for JEE (Main + Advanced) | NEET (UG) | MHT-CET

It helps students to compete with all India students in various competitive exams. The test series focuses on training the students by solving paper on the pattern of final exam covering the complete syllabus. The test questions are structured by the top and experienced faculties of various renowned institutes based on analysis of previous year question papers.

New 4 Year Policy Program

4 Year Classroom Program for JEE/NEET Aspirants

ENROLL NOW

The main objective of this Program is to help each & every Student get a Top Rank in JEE/NEET and various competitive and entrance exam. These Four years of intensive IIT-JEE/NEET program will help Students to gain an edge over the competition.

Why to Start Early?

  • To Achieve desired Success in JEE/NEET
  • Strengthen your Foundation
  • To get Competitive edge from the start

IX-X (Regular Syllabus) + JEE/NEET Foundation Program

Course Duration: 2 Year

XI-XII (Board Preparation) + JEE/NEET Core Entrance Preparation

Course Duration: 2 Year
